ast.name: web stuff
ast.comment: Searching, browsing and processing pages from the web

body.text: Searches for tagged questions on stackoverflow...
We start by asking the user for a search term
We build the query url. note how we escape the terms using 'url encode'
This line does 2 things: it downloads the result and parses it into a json data structure
We fetch the questions field from the json object. this should be an array of results that we can enumerate in a foreach loop
We create a message, the basic data structure to hold messages from social services
The information about the author is stored in a nested field owner
The link to the question page can easily be recreated from the question id. we don't need to url escape the number as it has been converter to a Number by the json parser.

Gravatar is a web service that provides a unique and stable image for email addresses. it is used in many different web sites to associate a photo to a user email address. StackOverflow makes our life easier here by providing the hash of the email that can be used to get the gravatar easily.
Uses a web service to generate and read qr codes.
s contains the text that the user wants to encode in a qr code... let's get to work!
good-survey.com created a qrcode that represents s
that's it!
if you are looking for more tagging features, try the 'tags' singleton
Shows how to display rich content on the wall.
This creates your basic internet link. click on the button launch it in the browser.
This will load an image from the web
When you need to see large images, create a deep zoom link that will display the image in a multi-scale viewer
You can also link to movies or sounds through the link media method
Shows how to share a link to facebook.
Share is a quick and easy way to publish your link to Facebook
Downloads and displays the Channel9 RSS feed.
downloads the RSS content from the Channel9 web site. Channel9 features movies about developers at Microsoft
transforms the RSS payload into a collection of messages
Calls a web service to explain a tag, then processes the xml result.
Uses the Microsoft Tag services to generate tags from text or picture urls.
You can easily create a tag from an url using the 'tag url' method. you can also specify the size and whether you want back and white as well. the generated tag can be printed or shared.

Fz4Q8s3ZSDYMJTlakjha1ANM.text: Encodes the text into a QR code. Requires an internet connection.

XJUHgjhJ4WwkeJOt0NWQrk1R.text: Decodes the QR code and returns the text, if any. Requires an internet connection.

app.name: qr codes
app.comment: Encodes and decodes QR codes using http://qrcode.good-survey.com.

qUc3KVXjpSgweFV3nl5A40mt.text: This library uses http://qrcode.good-survey.com. Please review the terms of use and privacy statement of good-survey.

mN1JfTNdErxSVx7yaTmONGnb.text: Pass the text to encode to the `encode` action. If successful, it returns a picture.

qUc3KVXjpSgweFV3nl5A40mt.text: This library uses http://www.esponce.com/. Please review the terms of use and privacy statement of esponce.

BunWz6eCOvQIhe85lO87fVZw.text: Pass the picture to `decode`. If successful, returns the text.

app.comment: Encodes and decodes QR codes using http://www.esponce.com/.
